panels.description:
The status of each changefeed.

0: Normal

1: Error

2: Failed

3: Stopped

4: Finished

-1: Unknown

panels.description:
The number of events that puller outputs to sorter 
 per second

panels.description: Estimate the remaining time for a changefeed initialization (on a specific capture)

targets.expr: abs(sum(ticdc_kvclient_cached_region{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", capture=~"$capture"} / deriv(ticdc_kvclient_cached_region{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", changefeed=~"$changefeed", capture=~"$capture"}[1m])) by (capture, changefeed, store))

panels.title: Estimate remaining time for initialization
Unified Sorter on disk data size
EtcdWorker exec etcd txn duration percentile

panels.description: The time consumed of writing WAL into the persistent storage in .99
panels.title: Etcd 99% WAL fsync duration

panels.title: Etcd 99% Handle transactions duration

panels.description: CPU usage of TiKV CDC component
panels.title: CDC CPU

panels.description: Outbound network traffic of TiKV CDC component
panels.title: CDC network traffic

panels.description: The count of different kinds of gRPC message
panels.title: gRPC message count

panels.description: The memory usage per TiKV instance

targets.expr: (avg(process_resident_memory_bytes{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance", job=~"tikv.*"}) by (instance)) - (avg(tikv_engine_block_cache_size_bytes{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance", db="kv"}) by(instance))

panels.title: CDC memory

panels.description: The min resolved ts of each TiKV
panels.title: Min resolved ts

panels.description: The ID of the min resolved region of each TiKV
panels.title: Min resolved Region

panels.description: The time consumed to CDC incremental scan
panels.title: Initial scan duration

panels.description: The number of incremental scan task in different status.

targets.expr: sum(tikv_cdc_scan_tasks{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance", type="total"}) by (instance) - sum(tikv_cdc_scan_tasks{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance", type=~"abort|finish"}) by (instance)

panels.title: Initial scan tasks status

panels.description: The memory usage per TiKV instance
panels.title: Captured region count

panels.description: The speed of TiKV CDC incremental scan
panels.title: CDC scan speed

panels.description: The total bytes of TiKV CDC incremental scan
panels.title: CDC total scan bytes

targets.expr: (sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_cache_access{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance) - sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_cache_miss{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance)) / sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_cache_access{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (instance)

panels.description: The total number of cache entries in the old value cache.
panels.title: Old value cache size

panels.description: The time consumed to get an old value (both from cache and from disk)
panels.title: Old value seek duration

targets.expr: sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_duration_sum{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (le, instance, tag) / sum(rate(tikv_cdc_old_value_duration_count{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$tikv_instance"}[1m])) by (le, instance, tag)

panels.description: TiCDC process rss memory usage. TiCDC heap memory size in use

targets.expr: go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_buck_hash_sys_bytes{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_gc_sys_bytes{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"} + go_memstats_other_sys_bytes{tidb_cluster="$tidb_cluster", instance=~"$runtime_instance"}

panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Count of live objects.
panels.title: Estimated Live Objects

panels.description: TiCDC process Go garbage collection STW pause duration
panels.title: GC STW Duration (last 256 GC cycles)

panels.description: The throughput of Go's memory allocator.
panels.title: Allocator Throughput
